ModMetaData.name: Twitch Toolkit
ModMetaData.author: nry
ModMetaData.description:
A fork of Twitch Tookit by Hodlhodl. 1.6 Support only This version has been updated to use the latest Harmony and Toolkit Core versions. This version is not compatible with older versions of Rimworld. Please report any issues on the GitHub page. GitHub: https://github.com/ekudram/twitchtoolkit This version experimented with AI tools to help with development.
AI Models used: Deepseek
